name: MouseEvent.initMouseEvent
description: The MouseEvent.initMouseEvent() method initializes the value of a mouse event once it's been created (normally using the Document.createEvent() method).

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'MouseEvent.initMouseEvent()' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification' specification.
